import math
def ch(n):
    s=1
    b=int(math.sqrt(n))+1
    for i in range(2,b):
        if n%i==0:
            s=s+i+n/i
    #print s
    return s     
    


t=input()
while(t):
    t=t-1
    n=input()
    x=ch(n)
    y=ch(x)
    if y==n:
        print "Yes, amicable with "+str(x)
    else:
        print "No"
